articles.title: El Salvador plans first 'Bitcoin City', backed by bitcoin bonds - CTV News
articles.description: El Salvador plans to build the world's first 'Bitcoin City', funded initially by bitcoin-backed bonds, President Nayib Bukele said on Saturday, doubling down on his bet to harness the crypto currency to fuel investment in the Central American country.
